roleset.name: to expose to pederasty, wherein an adolescent boy has an erotic relationship with an adult male

role.descr: Child, entity subjected to relations with an adult man

example.name: Passive
example.text: If people do n't want their kids pederastized but yet they entrust them to ' guys in gowns ' I just wonder what the hell are they thinking anyway ?

roleset.note: PEDERASTIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pederastize' baesed on instances in Webtext 2.5-2. No VerbNet entry. No Comparison. (from pederastize.01-v predicate notes)
